DOC.brief_summary: A total balanced fluid replacement strategy is a promising concept for correcting hypovolemia. The effects of a balanced fluid management including a new balanced hydroxyethylstarch (HES) in elderly cardiac surgery patients will be studied.
DOC.brief_title: A Total Balanced Volume Replacement Regimen in Elderly Cardiac Surgery Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients aged >80 years Chronic kidney dysfunction requiring dialysis Myocardial infarction within the previous 3 weeks Liver insufficiency
